ygData.subject: Asking for a little spoiler
ygData.msgSnippet: I am to be questing for an Oaken Scimitar for a Ranger friend. I have NO idea where to find this item.  I don t know what zone I can find it or on what mob.
ygData.messageBody:
I am to be questing for an Oaken Scimitar for a Ranger friend.

I have NO idea where to find this item. I don't know what zone I can find
it or on what mob.

Can anyone provide any info?

I am also after a shiny brass halberd for myself. I know it is supposed to
be in Highpass Hold, but I don't know what carries it.

I'd really hate to go looking on spoiler pages for this info because I
always find out more than I want to know. I really just want to know where
I am supposed to be looking for it.

Thanks

Bael
Warrior of the 16th Order
Paladin Slayer Extraordinaire
